info.description: This is a sample of RESTful api made by cargo-rest-api
info.title: cargo-rest-api

get.description: Retrieve base64 encoded string of private key and public key through rest api.

post.description: Retrieve an email contain link to reset password.

get.description: Get current user preference using Authorization Header.

put.description: Update current user preference using Authorization Header.

post.description: Reset current user preference to default using Authorization Header.

get.description: Get current user profile using Authorization Header.

post.description: Retrieve a new access_token using refresh token.

put.description: Update user avatar of existing user.
